TextBody:
Hello Ganeshan,
Before we can proceed further with the case, can you please provide us the following information:

•        What is the impact of the issue on your business?

•        Who is affected by this issue?

•        What are the steps to reproduce?

•        Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried?

•        What are you trying to do or accomplish?

•        When did this issue start?

•       Screen shots, logs, other artifacts, etc.
Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #441094 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NlLv0:ref - Cososys DLP Server not booting up.    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NlLv0:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello Ganeshan,

Thank you for getting back to us with the requested details.

From what we can see you are getting a ''fsck exited with status code 4'' error.

To sort this out, please take first a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualization environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).
This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.

After you take the snapshot, please run the below command:

e2fsck -f /dev/sda4

Then after the command completes, check again if you can boot up the EPP server.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
